verses.verse: And getting <S%G1684><s%> into a boat, <S%G4143><s%> He crossed <S%G1276><s%> over, <S%G1276><s%> and came <S%G2064><s%> to His own <S%G2398><s%> city. <S%G4172><s%>

And behold, <S%G2400><s%> they were bringing <S%G4374><s%> to Him a paralytic, <S%G3885><s%> lying <S%G906><s%> on a bed; <S%G2825><s%> and Jesus <S%G2424><s%> seeing <S%G3708><s%> their faith <S%G4102><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> to the paralytic, <S%G3885><s%> "Take <S%G2293><s%> courage, <S%G2293><s%> My son, <S%G5043><s%> your sins <S%G266><s%> are forgiven. <S%G863><s%>"
And behold, <S%G2400><s%> some <S%G5100><s%> of the scribes <S%G1122><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> to themselves, <S%G1438><s%> "This <S%G3778><s%> [fellow] blasphemes. <S%G987><s%>"
And Jesus <S%G2424><s%> knowing <S%G3609><s%> their thoughts <S%G1761><s%> said, <S%G3004><s%> "Why <S%G2444><s%> are you thinking <S%G1760><s%> evil <S%G4190><s%> in your hearts <S%G2588><s%>?

"For which <S%G5101><s%> is easier, <S%G2123><s%> to say, <S%G3004><s%> 'Your sins <S%G266><s%> are forgiven, <S%G863><s%>' or <S%G2228><s%> to say, <S%G3004><s%> 'Rise, <S%G1453><s%> and walk <S%G4043><s%>'?

"But in order <S%G2443><s%> that you may know <S%G3609><s%> that the Son <S%G5207><s%> of Man <S%G444><s%> has <S%G2192><s%> authority <S%G1849><s%> on earth <S%G1093><s%> to forgive <S%G863><s%> sins <S%G266><s%>" – then <S%G5119><s%> He said <S%G3004><s%> to the paralytic <S%G3885><s%> – "Rise, <S%G1453><s%> take <S%G142><s%> up your bed, <S%G2825><s%> and go <S%G5217><s%> home. <S%G3624><s%>"
And he rose, <S%G1453><s%> and went <S%G565><s%> home. <S%G3624><s%>

But when the multitudes <S%G3793><s%> saw <S%G3708><s%> [this,] they were filled <S%G5399><s%> with awe, <S%G5399><s%> and glorified <S%G1392><s%> God, <S%G2316><s%> who had given <S%G1325><s%> such <S%G5108><s%> authority <S%G1849><s%> to men. <S%G444><s%>

And as Jesus <S%G2424><s%> passed <S%G3855><s%> on from there, <S%G1564><s%> He saw <S%G3708><s%> a man, <S%G444><s%> called <S%G3004><s%> Matthew, <S%G3102><s%> sitting <S%G2521><s%> in the tax <S%G5058><s%> office; <S%G5058><s%> and He said <S%G3004><s%> to him, "Follow <S%G190><s%> Me!" And he rose, <S%G450><s%> and followed <S%G190><s%> Him.

And it happened <S%G1096><s%> that as He was reclining <S%G345><s%> [at the table] in the house, <S%G3614><s%> behold <S%G2400><s%> many <S%G4183><s%> tax-gatherers and sinners <S%G268><s%> came <S%G2064><s%> and were dining <S%G4873><s%> with Jesus <S%G2424><s%> and His disciples. <S%G3101><s%>

And when the Pharisees <S%G5330><s%> saw <S%G3708><s%> [this,] they said <S%G3004><s%> to His disciples, <S%G3101><s%> "Why <S%G1223><s%> <S%G5101><s%> is your Teacher <S%G1320><s%> eating <S%G2068><s%> with the tax-gatherers and sinners <S%G268><s%>?"

But when He heard <S%G191><s%> this, He said, <S%G3004><s%> "[It is] not those <S%G3588><s%> who are healthy <S%G2480><s%> who need <S%G5532><s%> a physician, <S%G2395><s%> but those <S%G3588><s%> who are sick. <S%G2560><s%>

"But go <S%G4198><s%> and learn <S%G3129><s%> what <S%G5101><s%> [this] means, <S%G1510><s%> 'I desire <S%G2309><s%> compassion, <S%G1656><s%> and not sacrifice, <S%G2378><s%>' for I did not come <S%G2064><s%> to call <S%G2564><s%> the righteous, <S%G1342><s%> but sinners. <S%G268><s%>"

Then <S%G5119><s%> the disciples <S%G3101><s%> of John <S%G2491><s%> came <S%G4334><s%> to Him, saying, <S%G3004><s%> "Why <S%G1223><s%> <S%G5101><s%> do we and the Pharisees <S%G5330><s%> fast, <S%G3522><s%> but Your disciples <S%G3101><s%> do not fast <S%G3522><s%>?"

And Jesus <S%G2424><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> to them, "The attendants <S%G5207><s%> of the bridegroom <S%G3567><s%> cannot <S%G1410><s%> <S%G3361><s%> mourn <S%G3996><s%> as long <S%G3745><s%> as the bridegroom <S%G3566><s%> is with them, can they? But the days <S%G2250><s%> will come <S%G2064><s%> when <S%G3752><s%> the bridegroom <S%G3566><s%> is taken <S%G522><s%> away <S%G522><s%> from them, and then <S%G5119><s%> they will fast. <S%G3522><s%>

"But no <S%G3762><s%> one <S%G3762><s%> puts <S%G1911><s%> a patch <S%G1915><s%> of unshrunk <S%G46><s%> cloth <S%G4470><s%> on an old <S%G3820><s%> garment; <S%G2440><s%> for the patch <S%G4138><s%> pulls <S%G142><s%> away <S%G142><s%> from the garment, <S%G2440><s%> and a worse <S%G5501><s%> tear <S%G4978><s%> results. <S%G1096><s%>

"Nor <S%G3761><s%> do [men] put <S%G906><s%> new <S%G3501><s%> wine <S%G3631><s%> into old <S%G3820><s%> wineskins; <S%G779><s%> otherwise <S%G7507><s%> the wineskins <S%G779><s%> burst, <S%G4486><s%> and the wine <S%G3631><s%> pours <S%G1632><s%> out, and the wineskins <S%G779><s%> are ruined; <S%G622><s%> but they put <S%G906><s%> new <S%G3501><s%> wine <S%G3631><s%> into fresh <S%G2537><s%> wineskins, <S%G779><s%> and both <S%G297><s%> are preserved. <S%G4933><s%>"

While He was saying <S%G2980><s%> these <S%G3778><s%> things <S%G3778><s%> to them, behold, <S%G2400><s%> there came <S%G4334><s%> a [synagogue] official, <S%G758><s%> and bowed <S%G4352><s%> down <S%G4352><s%> before <S%G4352><s%> Him, saying, <S%G3004><s%> "My daughter <S%G2364><s%> has just <S%G737><s%> died; <S%G5053><s%> but come <S%G2064><s%> and lay <S%G2007><s%> Your hand <S%G5495><s%> on her, and she will live. <S%G2198><s%>"
And Jesus <S%G2424><s%> rose <S%G1453><s%> and [began] to follow <S%G190><s%> him, and [so did] His disciples. <S%G3101><s%>

And behold, <S%G2400><s%> a woman <S%G1135><s%> who had been suffering <S%G131><s%> from a hemorrhage <S%G131><s%> for twelve <S%G1427><s%> years, <S%G2094><s%> came <S%G4334><s%> up behind <S%G3693><s%> Him and touched <S%G681><s%> the fringe <S%G2899><s%> of His cloak; <S%G2440><s%>
for she was saying <S%G3004><s%> to herself, <S%G1438><s%> "If <S%G1437><s%> I only <S%G3440><s%> touch <S%G681><s%> His garment, <S%G2440><s%> I shall get <S%G4982><s%> well. <S%G4982><s%>"

But Jesus <S%G2424><s%> turning <S%G4762><s%> and seeing <S%G3708><s%> her said, <S%G3004><s%> "Daughter, <S%G2364><s%> take <S%G2293><s%> courage; <S%G2293><s%> your faith <S%G4102><s%> has made <S%G4982><s%> you well. <S%G4982><s%>" And at once <S%G1565><s%> <S%G5610><s%> the woman <S%G1135><s%> was made <S%G4982><s%> well. <S%G4982><s%>

And when Jesus <S%G2424><s%> came <S%G2064><s%> into the official's house, <S%G3614><s%> and saw <S%G3708><s%> the flute-players, and the crowd <S%G3793><s%> in noisy <S%G2350><s%> disorder, <S%G2350><s%>
He [began] to say, <S%G3004><s%> "Depart; <S%G402><s%> for the girl <S%G2877><s%> has not died, <S%G599><s%> but is asleep. <S%G2518><s%>" And they [began] laughing <S%G2606><s%> at Him.

But when <S%G3753><s%> the crowd <S%G3793><s%> had been put <S%G1544><s%> out, He entered <S%G1525><s%> and took <S%G2902><s%> her by the hand; <S%G5495><s%> and the girl <S%G2877><s%> arose. <S%G1453><s%>
And this <S%G3778><s%> news <S%G5345><s%> went <S%G1831><s%> out into all <S%G3650><s%> that land. <S%G1093><s%>

And as Jesus <S%G2424><s%> passed <S%G3855><s%> on from there, <S%G1564><s%> two <S%G1417><s%> blind <S%G5185><s%> men <S%G5185><s%> followed <S%G190><s%> Him, crying <S%G2896><s%> out, and saying, <S%G3004><s%> "Have <S%G1653><s%> mercy <S%G1653><s%> on us, Son <S%G5207><s%> of David! <S%G7035><s%>"

And after He had come <S%G2064><s%> into the house, <S%G3614><s%> the blind <S%G5185><s%> men <S%G5185><s%> came <S%G4334><s%> up to Him, and Jesus <S%G2424><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> to them, "Do you believe <S%G4100><s%> that I am <S%G1410><s%> able <S%G1410><s%> to do <S%G4160><s%> this <S%G3778><s%>?" They said <S%G3004><s%> to Him, "Yes, <S%G3483><s%> Lord. <S%G2962><s%>"
Then <S%G5119><s%> He touched <S%G681><s%> their eyes, <S%G3788><s%> saying, <S%G3004><s%> "Be it done <S%G1096><s%> to you according <S%G2596><s%> to your faith. <S%G4102><s%>"

And their eyes <S%G3788><s%> were opened. <S%G455><s%> And Jesus <S%G2424><s%> sternly <S%G1690><s%> warned <S%G1690><s%> them, saying, <S%G3004><s%> "See <S%G3708><s%> [here,] let no <S%G3367><s%> one <S%G3367><s%> know <S%G1097><s%> [about this]!"
But they went <S%G1831><s%> out, and spread <S%G1310><s%> the news <S%G1310><s%> about Him in all <S%G3650><s%> that land. <S%G1093><s%>
And as they were going <S%G1831><s%> out, behold, <S%G2400><s%> a dumb <S%G2974><s%> man, <S%G444><s%> demon-possessed, was brought <S%G4374><s%> to Him.

And after the demon <S%G1140><s%> was cast <S%G1544><s%> out, the dumb <S%G2974><s%> man <S%G2974><s%> spoke; <S%G2980><s%> and the multitudes <S%G3793><s%> marveled, <S%G2296><s%> saying, <S%G3004><s%> "Nothing <S%G3763><s%> like <S%G3779><s%> this <S%G3779><s%> was ever <S%G3763><s%> seen <S%G5316><s%> in Israel. <S%G2474><s%>"
But the Pharisees <S%G5330><s%> were saying, <S%G3004><s%> "He casts <S%G1544><s%> out the demons <S%G1140><s%> by the ruler <S%G758><s%> of the demons. <S%G1140><s%>"

And Jesus <S%G2424><s%> was going <S%G4013><s%> about <S%G4013><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> the cities <S%G4172><s%> and the villages, <S%G2968><s%> teaching <S%G1321><s%> in their synagogues, <S%G4864><s%> and proclaiming <S%G2784><s%> the gospel <S%G2098><s%> of the kingdom, <S%G932><s%> and healing <S%G2323><s%> every <S%G3956><s%> kind <S%G3956><s%> of disease <S%G3554><s%> and every <S%G3956><s%> kind <S%G3956><s%> of sickness. <S%G3119><s%>

And seeing <S%G3708><s%> the multitudes, <S%G3793><s%> He felt <S%G4697><s%> compassion <S%G4697><s%> for them, because <S%G3754><s%> they were distressed <S%G4660><s%> and downcast <S%G4496><s%> like <S%G5616><s%> sheep <S%G4263><s%> without <S%G3361><s%> <S%G2192><s%> a shepherd. <S%G4166><s%>
Then <S%G5119><s%> He said <S%G3004><s%> to His disciples, <S%G3101><s%> "The harvest <S%G2326><s%> is plentiful, <S%G4183><s%> but the workers <S%G2040><s%> are few. <S%G3641><s%>
"Therefore <S%G3767><s%> beseech <S%G1189><s%> the Lord <S%G2962><s%> of the harvest <S%G2326><s%> to send <S%G1544><s%> out workers <S%G2040><s%> into His harvest. <S%G2326><s%>"
